reviewText: The Red thin line is good but Platoon don't have English sub-title only French&Spain,subtitles. I have hearing problem,need to read English subs.

OK, the good news first. It's a two movie combo. I wanted to re-watch thin red line, so getting platoon was a huge plus. The bad is, I had forgotten how disappointed I was with the thin red line,  but I sure remember now! Beach Red is a greatly superior movie, probably why Malick ripped off so much of it in the thin red line.
Both of these movies are jaw dropping. "Platoon" was quite a bit more edgey and R-rated while "The Thin Red Line" was more artistic. Nonetheless, an awesome buy!
